page.title: 14RELIGION IN NORTH YATE
page.content: A few people regularly go to church. Others just go on special occasions, such as weddings, funerals and christenings. Most people say that they believe in God, but a few people don't believe in God at all, and a number say that they don't really know. Of the people that are believers the majority belong to Church of England. A few are Methodist. The general feeling is that people are less religious than they used to be. Some people hold the opinion that you don't have to go to church to be religious .Those people that do still go regularly seem to be very strong in their faith.The most popular churches in the area are St James the Less in Iron Acton and St Mary's in Yate.
